Line 524:  
Line 525:  WriteLiteral(@">
Line 526:                              <h4>THE PROCESS</h4>
Line 527:                              <p>
Line 528:                                  When you want to order a Scottybons outfit, we ask you to pay 15 euro. For this we select an outfit and write a personal style advice for you. The shipment of this outfit is for free, and so is any potential return.
Line 529:                              </p>
Line 530:                              <p>
Line 531:                                  For the items you want to keep, you pay the normal retail prices, and you will receive an invoice only afterwards.
Line 532:                              </p>
Line 533:                              <p>
Line 534:                                  We do however ask you your permission to automatically collect this invoice. You will receive a message from your bank when they will debit your account.
Line 535:                              </p>
Line 536:                          </div>
Line 537:                      </div>
Line 538:                  </div>
Line 539:              </div>
Line 540:  ");
